channel.title: Strategy on all things considered...
channel.description: Recent content in Strategy on all things considered...

item.title: Buy versus Build
item.description: Photo by Ivan Henao on Unsplash This is maybe the most complex question that is never asked in the interview process in tech. And often not even on a managerial level. But: it is such an interesting one to discuss! There might be no right or wrong. But it does reveal a lot about people’s thought processes and mental models they have collected. This one here is mine. Today. One that might change in the years to come.
